00039 struct face
00040 {
00041         int face_num;
00042         bool four;
00043         int faces[4];
00044         face(int facen, int f1, int f2, int f3) : face_num(facen)
00045         {
00046                 faces[0] = f1;
00047                 faces[1] = f2;
00048                 faces[2] = f3;
00049                 four = false;
00050         }
00051         face(int facen, int f1, int f2, int f3,int f4) : face_num(facen)
00052         {
00053                 faces[0] = f1;
00054                 faces[1] = f2;
00055                 faces[2] = f3;
00056                 faces[3] = f4;
00057                 four = true;
00058         }
00059 };
